title: Add Docker images to installation docs
body:
As referenced in https://github.com/dmlc/mxnet/issues/273, this PR adds documentation for Docker images to the installation docs, based on what was done for [Theano](http://www.deeplearning.net/software/theano/install.html#docker-images). I'm not sure how you would want the [readme](https://github.com/dmlc/mxnet#contents) changed (as mentioned in a comment), but I can add another commit to this PR if you can specify the change in more detail.

If there are issues with the Docker images then please let me know, or even better submit a fix to my [repo](https://github.com/Kaixhin/dockerfiles).

title: [kvstore] switched to the `dev` branch of ps-lite
body:
- reimplemented kvstore_dist, the codes are shorter
- uses NDArray to store the data at server. but the performance is almost equal to the older `std::vector` way. since when received a data `recved`, the current implementation gurantees that any operations with `recved` is finished before return, because after that `recved` could be deleted by the system. so there are several `WaitToRead` here. 
- passed test on tests/python/multi-node

title: Add support for eval_data as ndarray pair.
body: It supports eval_data as ndarray pair, i.e. a tuple like `eval_data = (data, label)`, where `data` and `label` are both ndarray. The shape of `label` can be (n, ) or (n, 1), and the modification is tested under both cases. Hope my coding style is OK.
